p: Similarly, for antiobesity activity, the number of rings, relative number of oxygen atoms, average structural information content, and partial negative surface area, among others, were positive descriptors for an increase of lipid reducing activity of xanthone derivatives [ 54]. In a screening of 85 polyphenols, 2,3-dimethoxyxanthone ( 6) was the hit compound showing strong lipid reducing activity in zebrafish larvae in vivo and with no general toxicity being found to reduce the mRNA expression of fatty acid synthase.
